message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. After careful consideration, I believe it would be fair to propose a price of $12000 for this exceptional item. This price reflects its high value and the benefits it offers, while also providing you with a significant advantage compared to its market value. I look forward to your response.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of your product, but I am looking to keep my expenses within a certain budget. I am willing to pay $10500 for the product, which I believe is a fair compromise.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your position and respect your budget constraints. In order to reach a mutually beneficial agreement, I am proposing a revised price of $11000 for the product. This still allows us to maintain a reasonable profit margin while making the product accessible to you within your budget. I hope this proposal aligns better with your expectations.
